items.text: blocks a short ball on middle
items.postText: Rohit Nayyar: "That look on Mushi's face when Rayudu didn't walk...reminded me of our local matches"
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Sharma, no run

items.text: stands tall and hammers the back of a length delivery to sweeper cover
items.postText: Chandu: "Can Dhoni take india's chase to last over?"
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Sharma, 1 run

items.text: bouncer - at 132 kph - Dhoni drops his wrists and lets it fly by
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Dhoni, no run

items.text: works a short ball from off stump away to deep midwicket for a couple. He's 37. And yet there are few that are quicker between the stumps
items.postText: chirag shah: "Can Rohit score 40 of the next 67 runs?"
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Dhoni, 2 runs

items.text: taps a ball coming up above his waist to cover
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Dhoni, no run

items.text: full on off stump - he shuffles into line (hmm, he doesn't really do this too often) - and then blocks to cover
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Dhoni, no run

items.text: tosses it up on off stump, defends
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Sharma, no run

items.text: backs away as he sees a short ball outside off and slaps it through the covers
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Sharma, 1 run

items.text: shifts back against a flatter delivery angling into middle and leg and has to hurry into his shot - a hack back to the bowler
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Dhoni, no run

items.text: shimmies down the pitch and turns a length ball on middle stump behind square leg
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Dhoni, 1 run

items.text: presses forward to the pitch of a flighted delivery and blunts it
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Sharma, no run

items.text: opens the face and spears a length ball on off stump to sweeper cover
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Sharma, 1 run

items.text: he is ever so good against the short ball - picks the length early, gets in position, which in this case is beside the ball since it's so wide and clatters it to the sweeper
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Sharma, 1 run

items.text: back foot punch to short cover
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Dhoni, no run

items.text: back of a length and outside off, Dhoni pokes to short cover
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Dhoni, no run

items.text: outside edge as he goes for a cut and it's thick enough to fly away to the boundary, well to the left of deep third man
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Dhoni, FOUR runs

items.text: shortish on off stump, he turns it to the right of midwicket
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Dhoni, 1 run

items.text: lovely shot as Rohit keeps his balance against a ball trying to be a leg-stump yorker and flicks to deep midwicket
items.postText: Agni: "MSD came out early so that people don't switch to the Afghanistan match!!!"
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Sharma, 1 run

items.text: redirects a short ball angling across him to deep midwicket
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Sharma, 1 run

items.text: shuffles across onto off stump to flick a back of a length ball to midwicket
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Dhoni, 1 run

items.text: slower ball on leg stump, Rohit adjusts his bat-swing even as it comes down and nudges it behind square leg
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Sharma, 1 run

items.text: works it to short midwicket
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Dhoni, no run

items.text: moves across onto off stump and knocks a short ball off his hips to long leg
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Dhoni, 1 run

items.text: chops the ball darting across him away to deep third man
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Sharma, 1 run

items.text: defends a full delivery looking for the stumps
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Sharma, no run
